name: Envined
description: A short game that I made for the Kenney Jam.  Arrow keys or WASD to move, Shift to sprint (sprinting decreases your accuracy), LMB to shoot, R to reload, E to pick up ammo crates, and P to restart.  Shoot vines or shrubs to injure them (shrubs spawn vines after a bit of time).  Vines will damage you while you stand on them, but your health regenerates.  Over time you get more powerful and every 50 seconds, an ammo crate will drop with a random gun.  Killing shrubs will speed up drop times.  Waves will spawn automatically, or press the Space Bar to manually spawn them.
